  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    theme:
      version: 4
      # bg: "#101010"
      # fg: "#FDF7F7" 
      primary: "#0054AD"

  model: model

---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(easystats)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  error = TRUE,
  out.width = "100%"
)
```

```{r}
# Get user-specified model data
model <- params$model
parameters_args <- c(list(model), params$parameters_args)
performance_args <- c(list(model), params$performance_args)

table_parameters <- do.call(parameters::parameters, parameters_args)
table_performance <- do.call(performance::performance, performance_args)

text_report <- report(model)
```

Model fit 
=====================================  

Column {data-width=700}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Assumption checks

```{r check-model, fig.height=10, fig.width=10}
check_model(model)
```

Column {data-width=300}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Indices of model fit

```{r}
print_md(table_performance, layout = "vertical", caption = NULL)
```

For interpretation of performance metrics, please refer to [this documentation](https://easystats.github.io/performance/reference/model_performance.html).

Parameter estimates
=====================================  

Column {data-width=550}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Plot

```{r dot-whisker}
plot(table_parameters)
```

Column {data-width=450}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Tabular summary

```{r}
print_md(table_parameters, caption = NULL)
```

To find out more about table summary options, please refer to [this documentation](https://easystats.github.io/parameters/reference/model_parameters.html).
